name: Coinbase Transaction Sender
description: Tool for restoring a Coinbase wallet and sending a transaction
author: Shinkai

name.description: Identifier name for the Coinbase wallet to send transaction from

privateKey.description: Private key for wallet authentication. Must be a valid hex string

walletId.description: Specific wallet ID to send from. If not provided, uses default wallet

seed.description: BIP39 seed phrase for wallet recovery. Optional, 12 or 24 words

useServerSigner.description: Enable server-side signing for transactions. Set to 'true' or 'false'

recipient_address.description: Valid Ethereum address to send tokens to. Must be a 42-character hex string starting with 0x

assetId.description: Token identifier (e.g., 'ETH' for Ethereum, contract address for other tokens)

amount.description: Amount of tokens to send in decimal format. Must be a valid number string

transactionHash.description: The hash of the completed transaction

transactionLink.description: A link to view the transaction on a block explorer
